alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:52AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lee County through 1130 AM EDT... At 1052 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pineland, or 12 miles west of Cape Coral, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, McGregor, Matlacha, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Pineland, Iona, St. James City, Pine Island Center, East Dunbar, Burnt Store Marina, Saint James City, North Fort Myers, Punta Rassa, Suncoast Estates, Bokeelia, Tice, and Useppa Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
